tool_description: this api can help you find the most recent lol champ stat, including win_rate, kda, tier and counter stat.
name: LOL champion stat
title: LOL champion stat

api_list.name: COUNTER STAT
api_list.description:
display a list of champs that has the win rate lower than 49% for a particular champ.
For character like K'Sante with quote inside name, use double quote instead of single quote

api_list.name: CHAMP STAT
api_list.description:
check champion basic stat
each role(if available) will have its own data
For character like K'Sante with quote inside name, use double quote instead of single quote

api_list.name: WIN RATE RANKING
